Hi.

My name is Mark Wilson.

I’m a 26 year old UI & UX Designer from Glasgow, Scotland helping companies to build beautiful and functional products.

I've designed apps for iOS and Android, Desktop and Web, Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality.

Recently, I made sketchsheets.com. A source for downloading loads of ready to print device templates.

I'm in the process of updating my portfolio and adding projects. In the meantime you can check out my dribbble.

Let's Boogie
